p:
The birth‐death skyline model implemented in Beast 2.48 was used to infer changes in the effective reproductive number ( R e), and other epidemiological parameters such as the death/recovery rate ( δ), the transmission rate ( λ), the origin of the epidemic, and the sampling proportion ( ρ).
9 Given that the samples were collected during a short period of time, a “birth‐death contemporary” model was used.
